name: OR_CASE_PROC_RQST
description: The OR_CASE_PROC_RQST table contains OR management system case procedure requests.

columns.name: OR_CASE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the case record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The number of the line of procedure request in the case.

columns.name: PROCEDURE_REQUEST
columns.description: The free text procedure request for the case.
